mods.abstract: Full-length picture of Matthew Vassar as an older man wearing glasses, black tie, white shirt and black suit. His home, Springside, and trees are in the background.

titleInfo.title: Maria Mitchell: Vassar College astronomy professor, 1865-1888, and her father

originInfo.publisher: Online collection published by Vassar College Archives and Special Collections, Poughkeepsie, N.Y.

mods.abstract: Full-length picture of Maria Mitchell and her father, William. She is wearing a dark headpiece, white collar and long, dark button-down dress. She is seated on the right of a small, round table, her cheek is resting on her right hand and her left hand is pointing to papers on the table. Her father is wearing a white shirt and dark suit. He is seated on the left of the table with his right leg crossed over his left leg.

name.namePart: Peter A. Juley & Son (New York City)

originInfo.publisher: Online collection published by Vassar College Archives and Special Collections, Poughkeepsie, N.Y.

mods.abstract: Full-length picture of Matthew Vassar as an older man wearing a black tie, white shirt and black suit. He is holding a cane in his left hand, standing on a tiled balcony, and pointing to the Main Building of Vassar College. A black hat and white gloves are on the left. A large urn on a pedestal is on the right. Picture of a life-sized painting done by Charles Elliott in 1861.
mods.accessCondition: For more information about rights and reproduction, visit http://specialcollections.vassar.edu/policies/permissionto.html
